name: cattily
content:
Add to word list

in a way that is unkind because what you say is intended to hurt someone: "I didn’t have to beg for my invitation," he commented cattily. The three teenagers whispered cattily behind their hands. See
catty
More examplesFewer examplesYou do not, as one reader cattily suggested, need to clean the tiles with a toothbrush.They cattily disparaged the other teams. He cattily accused his opponent of defensive tactics and relying on the mistakes of others to win matches.
